system_message: Given JSON objects about news articles with their links. Open the links, then evaluate each of their sentiments using an integer between 0-10. Also create a quick summary about 50-75 words of each article.

function.name: evaluate_news
function.description: Evaluates and formats the news for use in the frontend.

sentiment.description: The sentiment score of the given article. From a scale of 0-10 in the public point of views. 0 being incredibly negative for the brand to analyze, while 10 being incredibly postive for the brand to analyze.

summary.description: A short summary of the given article. About 50-75 words.

system_message: Explain what is going on in this image in 50-75 words.
